name: TDX_XS_FUNC_GUEST_MEM_ACPT_NEG_NEW
cmdline: cd ddt_intel/lkvs/guest-test && ./guest.test_launcher.sh -v 1 -s 1 -m 16 -d on -t tdx -f tdx -x TD_MEM_ACPT_NEG -c "accept_memory=eager" -p off
summary: Check TD guest boot with lazy_accept disabled (accept_memory=eager) and nr_unaccpeted in /proc/vmstat
